DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim ass whether postoperative gum chew improve intestinal function .
DOC.brief_title: Gum Chewing Postoperative Intestinal Function After Gynecolgic Operations
DOC.detailed_description: We randomize patient two group gynecologic operation . One group chew gum , group assess gastrointestinal function function .
DOC.criteria: Women underwent gynecologic operation Women eligible gum chew Women previous gastrointestinal intervantion Women previous abdominal surgery
